text: For Heaven's Sake is a 1950 American romantic fantasy drama movie directed by George Seaton and was based on the 1949 play May We Come In? by Harry Segall. It stars Clifton Webb, Joan Bennett, Robert Cummings and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1950 romantic drama movies Category:1950s fantasy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1950s American fantasy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by George Seaton Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: For Heaven's Sake (1950 movie)
